A sexy striped tunic with cashmere softness. Fashion-forward button detailing on one shoulder keeps this look young and fun. Pair with a sweater legging for a complete cool-weather look.
  • 40% Viscose/30% Nylon/25% Polyester/5% Cashmere
  • Boat neck
  • Button detail on one shoulder
  • Dolman sleeves
  • Tunic length
  • Hand wash
  • Imported

Product.Name: Metallic Striped Cocoon Sweater
Product.Description:
Bring definition to your signature seasonal style with a cocoon coverup. Metallic stripes and dolman sleeves radically renovate a traditional sweater.
  • 55% Cotton/35% Viscose/7% Nylon/3% Angora wool
  • Ribbed lapel
  • Open style, dolman sleeves
  • Metallic stripe
  • Rounded cocoon hem
  • Imported

Product.Name: Metallic Mesh Stitch Dolman
Product.Description:
This open-stitch look is extra lightweight for fabulous layering style. A touch of metallic lurex gives this sweater a cool shine. Easy to wear, easy to love.
  • 85% rayon, 10% polyester, 5% metallic
  • Scoop neck
  • Dolman sleeves
  • Ribbed hem, cuffs and neckline
  • Open-stitch
  • Dry clean only
  • Imported

Product.Name: Cowl-Neck Pullover Sweatshirt
Product.Description:
The sweet surrender of fleece. Get luxurious lounging style with our draped cowl-neck pullover.
  • 100% Cotton
  • Draped cowl neck
  • Three-quarter length sleeves
  • Cropped
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Metallic Cable Knit T-Shape Sweater
Product.Description:
Our newest silhouette in sweaters is the casual T-shape pullover. Featuring metallic threading for a hint of sparkle and a chunky cable knit fit for the season.
  • 50% Mohair/29% Acrylic/21% Nylon & Lurex
  • Crew neck
  • T-shape, short sleeves
  • Open stitch cable knit
  • Metallic threading
  • Hand wash
  • Imported

Product.Description:
A hefty, thick-knit coverup for chic weekend style. Short dolman sleeves and a rounded ribbed hem make up this season's most-loved silhouette.
